1.name: Spirit Blade
1.details:
Every 3rd basic attack of Blademaster deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power) and a Spirit Blade will spawn where Blademaster is.

Spirit Blade will stay for a while. Blademaster can pick up a Spirit Blade to gain increased movement speed that decays over time, and converts a small percentage of his next basic attack damage to true damage.

It is possible to pick up multiple Spirit Blades, but Blademaster can only use one for each basic attack (maximum 5 Spirit Blades).

2.name: Condemn
2.details:
Blademaster’s next basic attack within a few seconds deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

When Blademaster kills an enemy with Condemn, half of the mana cost and cooldowns will be refunded.

In addition, a Spirit Blade will spawn on top of that unit.

3.name: Blade Work
3.details: Blademaster summons a Spirit Blade in a target location. Within a short while, Blademaster gains increased movement speed towards all the present Spirit Blades.

4.name: Blade Surge
4.details:
Blademaster dashes to a Spirit Blade. Within a few seconds, Blademaster's next basic attack will dash to the target enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and granting himself increased attack speed for the next 3 basic attacks.

The attack speed boost lasts for a short while or until all 3 basic attacks are used.

5.name: Blade Storm
5.details:
Blademaster briefly channels then dashes to a target location, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies within the path.

In addition, all the Spirit Blades will return to him during the dash, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in the path and greatly slowing them for a very short duration.
